item.description:
This class is postponed, due to conflicts in scheduling.  I've contacted the members who planned to attend. We'd like to reschedule in the Fall, when we've had a bit more time for planning, and when people are not so busy.

 

We'd like to plan on a series of Sewing classes, including quilting, art sewing, sewing clothes for kids and making gifts.  We'll be posting some polls later to assess the interest, and determine the best time to schedule these.

 

Look for the Open Studio for this time frame...soon to be posted!!

 

Martha and Jen are going to teach you how to use your sewing machines if you have one. If you don't and still want to learn we have some extras to use. You will learn about your machine and we will sew a project. The fee will be to cover the cost of the studio and your fabric. We will cater this workshop to the attendees so let us know what kind of machine you have and what you are hoping to learn!

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Sewing 101 POSTPONED
